messages.subject: Aren't you all proud of me?
messages.msgSnippet: Tara has asked to go to Fright Nights at Islands of Adventure in Orlando with her girlfriend, her boyfriend and also Tara s boyfriend. And guess what I said??
messages.messageBody:
Tara has asked to go to Fright Nights at Islands of Adventure in Orlando
with her girlfriend, her boyfriend and also Tara's boyfriend. And guess what
I said?? Yes!!! She is so excited and can't believe she can go. I asked her
if she thought I was some kind of ogre or something. Her boyfriend even told
her I would let them go. It's a whole spooky scare the crap out of the kids
thing they do at one of the parks in Universal. They set up a haunted house
and have creepy people chasing you all over the place. Her friends went last
year and said it was great. She's happy and I'm happy and things are going
well. And the kicker is that my husband didn't even have a major problem
with it. How about that?????

Mary B
